snippet: A report released by the Office of the Child Advocate of Massachusetts criticized the state’s Department of Children and Families for its handling of the case of Bella Bond, the 2-year-old found dead on a beach in Boston this year.
abstract: Report by Office of Child Advocate of Massachusetts criticizes state's Department of Children and Families for not giving high enough priority to neglect reports filed in 2012 and 2013 against Rachelle Bond, mother of Bella Bond, 2-year-old found dead on beach near Boston in 2015.
lead_paragraph: A report released by the Office of the Child Advocate of Massachusetts criticized the state’s Department of Children and Families for its handling of the case of Bella Bond, the 2-year-old found dead on a beach in Boston this year.

headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Report Faults Agency in Death of Toddler Found on Beach
headline.main: Massachusetts: Report Faults Agency in Death of Toddler Found on Beach
